products.title: Alessi Porcelain Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their alessi range is a great purchase for a room, the very affordable polyester vertical blinds come in an array of vibrant colours. The textured fabric of this vertical blind is an excellent choice for your space. Snow white will ensure a fresh finish for your space. Product id: sdb-vtb1366 fabric colour: porcelain material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes alessi porcelain cream 89mm vertical blind in cream.

products.title: Arcadia Porcelain Vertical Blind
products.description: If you want to keep your window area simple and streamlined, then the arcadia porcelain vertical blind is a fantastic choice, with rigid pvc vanes and no chains. products.title: Alessi Porcelain Vertical Blind
products.description: Using a mix of matt and sheen threads to create a two tone pattern giving a touch of luxury to a room. Alessi porcelain vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Caribou Porcelain Vertical Blind
products.description: If neutral colour schemes are your safe harbour, then theres no securer option than the caribou porcelain vertical blind. The waterproof, blackout pvc allows you to lounge in luxury, adding an extra touch of privacy to your charming interior.

products.title: Alessi Porcelain
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close blind coordinated with headrail colour, chrome chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right. Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
